title: User Experience Design
text: An extremely user-friendly App. With dedicated UX design, you can master the App without learning and start right away to free yourself from the hassle of massive manual tests.

section.title: UX Design
section.content: The UX design is considered for managing multiple tests at a time with large buttons.

section.title: Color code
section.content: Colors are well designed to have different meanings to help user react faster.
